conditions.title: Abrasion
conditions.description: Loss of surface material due to rubbing, scraping, or wear

conditions.title: Crease
conditions.description: line of crushed or broken substrate fibers resulting from a fold

conditions.title: Delamination
conditions.description: Separation of layers in an object due to the failure of an adhesive or binding agent

conditions.title: Foxing
conditions.description: Reddish-brown spots or blotches on paper

conditions.title: Insect Damage
conditions.description: Physical damage caused due to insects or pests

conditions.title: Mould
conditions.description: Fungi growth that appears usually as black spots

conditions.title: Rust
conditions.description: Reddish-brown coating caused by oxidation of iron or iron alloys

conditions.title: Showthrough/Bleedthrough
conditions.description: Inks or printing showing on the reverse side
